mutants.code:
from math import ceil

def will_it_balance(stick, gnd):
    total_mass = sum(stick)
    grav_pt = sum((v * i for (i, v) in enumerate(stick))) * total_mass
    return gnd[int(grav_pt)] == gnd[ceil(grav_pt)] == 1
